channel.title: Comments on: First glance at the new Red Gate SQL Monitor

item.title: By: Ted Krueger (onpnt)

item.content:encoded:
Awesome! Thanks for posting the info on that problem. ðŸ™‚ Glad it is working out well for you also. I think it is on the right path and has a great start.

If you have a chance, email or post back some of the points that you think could be better.

item.title: By: Rhys
item.dc:creator: Rhys
item.content:encoded:
I’ve been using this at work. It’s pretty good but does need some tweaking. The Bad data error is a Microsoft problem…

Red-Gate Message Board topic

item.title: By: David Forck (thirster42)
item.dc:creator: David Forck (thirster42)
item.description: Yeah, I've been fairly impressed with it myself. Great blog.
item.content:encoded: Yeah, I’ve been fairly impressed with it myself. Great blog.
